name: Dreadful Bakery
description:
You're a baker who gets more and more obsessed with your art of pizza creation, combining the most exotic ingredients and blessing the world with the utmost unholy crafts that should not be seen by mortal eyes.

This game was created for Pizza Jam, the theme was one of the deadly sins and I've chosen to go with Pride--

As you play through the game you can see the senseless hoarding and a twisted sense of pride take root in the bakery as your grotesque achievements pile up.

Controls

Mouse

Art & Code were made fully by me alone.

Background music is a royalty free song "After the Fall" from  https://www.purple-planet.com

Seeing that I didn't implement a hint system yet and there's so many possible combinations, I'm listing them all here, so, -spoilers-
